| | | | [] | | ;------------+---+---------+-------------------------------------------------+--------+-------------+ ; | | | | [] | | ;==================================================================================================== new blnMsgFound,GROUP,GROUPZ,objEmployee,YBEDI,YFUNCT set YDDSATZ=0 set YBEDI = $get(%(YQUERY,"YBEDI")) ;The "Other Person" user ;BEDIENER if YBEDI="" set YBEDI=YBED ; vvv SR15387 moved up set YFUNCT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YFUNCT")) ; fällig / ALLES/ Zukunft/ ALLE FÄLLIG if +$piece(YFUNCT,"-",1)=0 set $piece(YFUNCT,"-",1)=1 ; Reminder Type set $piece(YFUNCT,"-",2)=+$piece(YFUNCT,"-",2) ; Reminder Priority set objEmployee = $get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1)) set GROUP = $$$WWW013EmployeeGroup(objEmployee) if GROUP="" set GROUP = " " set GROUPZ = $translate($$$WWW013AdditionalEmployeeGroups(objEmployee),",",";") ;ERLAUBTE GRUPPEN set YDREID = +$get(YDREID) ; 3D Effect WWW012 D157 bln ; ^^^ SR15387 write YCR,"",YCR write "",YCR ;--------------------------------------- ;write "" ; SR15387 missing ;--------------------------------------- ; @@@@@ Move disabled code to bottom of routine @@@@@ ;--------------------------------------- ;WRITE "" ; Gap between tables ;ABSTAND ZUR TABELLE write "" ; SR15387 missing ;--------------------------------------- write "

if 'blnMsgFound { write "" write YCR,$$^WWWTEXT(119),YCR ; "No Data Record Found" ;kein WV vorhanden write "" ; SR15387 } write "
" quit UserName(YBEDI,YDREID,GROUP,GROUPZ) PRIVATE ; internal subroutine ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; ByRef: ; YBED ; ; History : ; 02-Apr-2007 GRF SR15387: Moved as separate subroutine; simplified (removed ; unnecessary table level and COLSPAN) and converted to ; brace format; corrected , swap; closed ; ; use seconds rather than calculating; common user subr; ; add standard variables; remove unnecessary . ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;

" ; "Delete all" option as link on user name only for supervisor in ; development area when displaying own details. if blnDevelopment && (YBED=YBEDI) && (+$$^WWWBEDBER(YBED)=1) { ; "All Reminder" / "Delete Data Record?" write "" } write YCR,$piece($get(^WWW013(0,YBEDI,1)),Y,1)_"

maintains height of field if blnDevelopment write "" write "		"_YCR set TVORG = $get(^TERMIN8(YM,GROUP,1)) if TVORG="" set TVORG = 28800_Y_68400_Y_1_Y_1_Y_1_Y_1 ; From 08:00 to 19:00 ; SR15387 if $piece(TVORG,Y,6)=$$$YES { ; Permitted Access To Group Members write "" write "    "_$$^WWWTEXT(32577)_": " ; "Reminder Other Persons" write YCR,"" write "" ; SR15387 added } write "

" . . WRITE "" . . WRITE "" . . SET YA=$PIECE(YI(1),"#",YI) . . WRITE " " . . IF YI=$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",1) WRITE "" . . WRITE YA_" " . . IF YI=$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",1) WRITE "" . . WRITE "" . . WRITE "
" DO FSE^WWWTAB WRITE YCR QUIT */ Heading PRIVATE ; internal subroutine ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Column Headings ; 1 2 3 4 5 6 ; Reminder : : Form : Reference : Delete : From / Date : ; internal subroutine ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; einzelwert ;Single Value ; ; ByRef: ; YFUNCT ; ; History : ; 02-Apr-2007 GRF SR15387: Moved as separate subroutine; brace format; ; common user subr; add standard variables ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new arrUsers,blnMsgFound,DATE,FORM,idCheckedNo,idUser,idxGROUP,KEY,LFN,loop,objMsg,strPriority set LFN = 0 set blnMsgFound = $$$NO set idCheckedNo = +$piece(YFUNCT,"-",1) set strPriority = $piece(YFUNCT,"-",2) if idCheckedNo<4 { set idUser=YBEDI set DATE="" for { set DATE = $order(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE)) quit:DATE="" continue:(+YFUNCT=1)&&($piece(DATE,".",1)>$horolog) ; Overtime Date Reminder ;FÄLLIGE continue:(+YFUNCT=3)&&($piece(DATE,".",1)'>$horolog) ; Future Date Reminder ;NUR ZUKUNFT set FORM="" for { set FORM = $order(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE,FORM)) quit:FORM="" set KEY="" for { set KEY = $order(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE,FORM,KEY)) quit:KEY="" set objMsg=$get(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE,FORM,KEY,1)) continue:(strPriority'=0)&&(+$piece(objMsg,Y,5)'=strPriority) ;BESTIMMTE PRIORITÄT ANZEIGEN ;priority display do ANZEIGE(.blnMsgFound,idUser,DATE,FORM,KEY,$increment(LFN),objMsg) } } } } elseif idCheckedNo=4 { ; Due Reminders Of All Persons set idxGROUP=$$^WWWUMLAU(GROUP,1) set idUser="" for { set idUser = $order(^WWW013s(0,2,idxGROUP,idUser)) quit:idUser="" do AddUser(idUser,.arrUsers) } if $translate(GROUPZ,";")'="" { for loop=1:1 { quit:$piece(GROUPZ,";",loop,999)="" set idxGROUP=$$^WWWUMLAU($piece(GROUPZ,";",loop),1) ;WEITERE ERLAUBTE GRUPPEN set idUser="" for { set idUser = $order(^WWW013s(0,2,idxGROUP,idUser)) quit:idUser="" do AddUser(idUser,.arrUsers) } } } set idUser="" for { set idUser = $order(arrUsers(idUser)) quit:idUser="" set DATE="" for { set DATE = $order(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE)) quit:DATE="" continue:$piece(DATE,".",1)>$horolog ;FÄLLIGE set FORM="" for { set FORM = $order(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE,FORM)) quit:FORM="" set KEY="" for { set KEY = $order(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE,FORM,KEY)) quit:KEY="" set objMsg=$get(^WWWWV(YM,idUser,DATE,FORM,KEY,1)) continue:(strPriority'=0)&&(+$piece(objMsg,Y,5)'=strPriority) ;BESTIMMTE PRIORITÄT ANZEIGEN ;priority display do ANZEIGE(.blnMsgFound,idUser,DATE,FORM,KEY,$increment(LFN),objMsg) } } } } } /* ; SR15387 : old version for peer review NEW WV,DATE,KEY,TXT SET LFN=0 SET WV=0 IF +$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",1)<4 SET DATE="" FOR SET DATE=$ORDER(^WWWWV(YM,YBEDI,DATE)) QUIT:DATE="" DO . IF +YFUNCT=1 QUIT:$PIECE(DATE,".",1)>$HOROLOG ;FÄLLIGE . IF +YFUNCT=3 QUIT:$PIECE(DATE,".",1)'>$HOROLOG ;NUR ZUKUNFT ;only future . SET FORM="" . FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWWWV(YM,YBEDI,DATE,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . . SET KEY="" . . FOR SET KEY=$ORDER(^WWWWV(YM,YBEDI,DATE,FORM,KEY)) QUIT:KEY="" DO . . . SET TXT=$GET(^WWWWV(YM,YBEDI,DATE,FORM,KEY,1)) . . . IF +$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",2)'=0 QUIT:+$PIECE(TXT,Y,5)'=$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",2) ;BESTIMMTE PRIORITÄT ANZEIGEN ;priority display . . . SET YMIT=YBEDI . . . DO ANZEIGE IF +$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",1)=4 DO . KILL YA . SET YGROUP=$$^WWWUMLAU(GROUP,1) . IF YGROUP="" SET YGROUP=" " . SET MIT="" . FOR SET MIT=$ORDER(^WWW013s(0,2,YGROUP,MIT)) QUIT:MIT="" DO . . SET YA(MIT)="" . ; . IF $TRANSLATE(GROUPZ,";")'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(GROUPZ,";",YI,999)="" SET YGROUP=$$^WWWUMLAU($PIECE(GROUPZ,";",YI),1) DO ;WEITERE ERLAUBTE GRUPPEN . . IF YGROUP="" SET YGROUP=" " . . SET MIT="" . . FOR SET MIT=$ORDER(^WWW013s(0,2,YGROUP,MIT)) QUIT:MIT="" DO . . . SET YA(MIT)="" . ; . SET YMIT="" . FOR SET YMIT=$ORDER(YA(YMIT)) QUIT:YMIT="" DO . . SET DATE="" . . FOR SET DATE=$ORDER(^WWWWV(YM,YMIT,DATE)) QUIT:DATE="" DO . . . QUIT:$PIECE(DATE,".",1)>$HOROLOG ;FÄLLIGE . . . SET FORM="" . . . FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWWWV(YM,YMIT,DATE,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . . . . SET KEY="" . . . . FOR SET KEY=$ORDER(^WWWWV(YM,YMIT,DATE,FORM,KEY)) QUIT:KEY="" DO . . . . . SET TXT=$GET(^WWWWV(YM,YMIT,DATE,FORM,KEY,1)) . . . . . IF +$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",2)'=0 QUIT:+$PIECE(TXT,Y,5)'=$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",2) ;BESTIMMTE PRIORITÄT ANZEIGEN ;priority display . . . . . DO ANZEIGE */ quit blnMsgFound ;ANZEIGE ;einzelne WVs ; SR15387 ANZEIGE(&blnMsgFound,pidUser,DATE,FORM,KEY,LFN,pobjMsg) PRIVATE ; internal subroutine ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; ByRef: ; YDDSATZ ; SPRACHE ; ; History: ; 02-Apr-2007 GRF SR15387: pass arguments; apply style in TR rather than TD; ; use strColour, blnSeen, blnMsgFound, pobjMsg; close ; 02-Apr-2007 GRF SR15387: ; 09-Feb-2006 RPW SR14135: Fixed javascript errors. ; 7-Jul-2005 JW SR12867: Converted text ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; ... ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnSeen,COLOR,FARBCODE,loop,objRecord,strColour,strKey,strText set LFN=LFN+1 set COLOR="" if +$piece(pobjMsg,Y,5)'=0 { ;PRIORITÄT ;priority set FARBCODE = $piece($get(^WWW101(0,"PRIORITAET",SPRACHE,$piece(pobjMsg,Y,5),1)),Y,2) if FARBCODE'="" set COLOR = $piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,FARBCODE,1)),Y,1) ;ANZEIGEFARBE } set strColour = $select(COLOR'="":" COLOR="_COLOR,1:"") ; SR15387 ; CHECK, WHETHER ALREADY VISITED ;PRUEFEN, OB SCHON BESUCHT set blnSeen = $$$NO /* ; SR15387 ;I $E(FORM,1,6)="INWERB" DO DO . NEW KEY1,YI . SET KEY1=$TRANSLATE(KEY,"/",",") . SET YSEEN=1 . IF '$DATA(^WWW126(YM,FORM,YUSER)) SET YSEEN=0 QUIT . FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(KEY1,",",YI)="" IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW126(YM,FORM,YUSER,YI,1)),Y,1)'=$PIECE(KEY1,",",YI) SET YSEEN=0 QUIT */ set strKey=$TRANSLATE(KEY,"/",",") set blnSeen = $$$YES if '$data(^WWW126(YM,FORM,YUSER)) { set blnSeen = $$$NO } else { for loop=1:1 { quit:$piece(strKey,",",loop)="" if $piece($get(^WWW126(YM,FORM,YUSER,loop,1)),Y,1)'=$piece(strKey,",",loop) { set blnSeen = $$$NO quit } } } set blnMsgFound = $$$YES ;WRITE "" ; vvv SR15387 write "",YCR ; ^^^ SR15387 ;--------------------------------------- ; *1* - WV DATUM ;Date ;--------------------------------------- ;WRITE "" ;WRITE "" write "" write "" ; ^^^ SR15387 ;IF $PIECE(pobjMsg,Y,5)=1 WRITE "" write $$^WWWDATE($piece(DATE,".",1)) ;WIEDERVORLAGEDATUM write "" write "",YCR ;--------------------------------------- ; *2* - ÖFFNEN ;open ;--------------------------------------- write "" write "" write "" write YCR,"" write "" write "",YCR ; SR15387 ;--------------------------------------- ; *3* - FORMULAR ;form ;--------------------------------------- write "" write "" ; SR15387 ;IF $PIECE(pobjMsg,Y,5)=1 WRITE "" ; vvvvv SR15411 ;DO ;. IF $DATA(^WWW1201(0,FORM,SPRACHE,1)) IF $PIECE(^(1),Y,1)'="" WRITE $EXTRACT($PIECE(^(1),Y,1),1,20) QUIT ;. WRITE $EXTRACT($PIECE($GET(^WWW120(0,FORM,1)),Y,1),1,20) if $piece($get(^WWW1201(0,FORM,SPRACHE,1)),Y,1)'="" { write $extract($piece($get(^WWW1201(0,FORM,SPRACHE,1)),Y,1),1,20) } else { write $extract($piece($get(^WWW120(0,FORM,1)),Y,1),1,20) } ; ^^^^^ SR15411 ;write "
" if FORM'="INDRPRUN" write " / "_KEY ;GGF ADRESSE ;address if FORM'="" { set objRecord = $$ReadRecord(FORM,$piece(KEY,"/",1)) ; FIXME : should this be and else after checking if $piece(objRecord,Y,8)'="" write "
",$piece(objRecord,Y,8) ; for the other two record? ; Executed Measures if (FORM="INWERBADR1") { write "
",$piece($get(^INWERBADR(YM,$piece(KEY,"/",1),1)),Y,8) ; FIXME : Should we check for null piece 8 first? } elseif FORM="INKUNDED" { if $data(^INKUNDE(YM,$piece(KEY,"/",1),1)) { write "
",$piece($get(^INKUNDE(YM,$piece(KEY,"/",1),1)),Y,8) } } } /* DO ;GGF ADRESSE ;address ; SR15387 . NEW YFELD,YDATEI . SET YFELD="" . IF FORM'="" DO . . SET YDATEI=$PIECE($GET(^WWW120(0,FORM,1)),Y,11) . . IF YDATEI'="" DO ^WWWLESE(YDATEI,$PIECE(KEY,"/",1)) . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,8)'="" WRITE "

" . . . . WRITE $PIECE($GET(^INKUNDE(YM,$PIECE(KEY,"/",1),1)),Y,8) */ write "" write "",YCR ;--------------------------------------- ; *4* - BETREFF ;--------------------------------------- write "" write "" ; SR15387 ;IF $PIECE(TXT,Y,5)=1 WRITE "" ;WRITE $PIECE(TXT,Y,4) ;WRITE $zconvert($PIECE(TXT,Y,4),"o","HTML") // SR12867 set strText = $piece(pobjMsg,Y,4) if strText["<" set strText = $zconvert(strText,"o","HTML") write strText_" " write "" write "",YCR ;--------------------------------------- ; *5* - LÖSCHEN ;Delete ;--------------------------------------- write "" ;WRITE "",2),"",1)_") \n"_$$^WWWTEXT(321)_"')) window.location='" ;WRITE "" ;WRITE YCR,"" ;WRITE "" ;CHECK BOX ;13.11.03;FAN;24255 ;---------- set strText = $zconvert($piece(pobjMsg,Y,4),"o","HTML") ; SR14135 ; FIXME : see *4* - does this need test for "<" or is that superfluous? ;write "" ; SR14135 write "" ; SR14135 write YCR,"" /* vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START ;DO ;HIDDEN FELD ;13.11.03;FAN;24255 ;BEC;11.12.03;AUSGESCHALTET, DAFÜR TABELLE UPGEDATET . ;WRITE "
" . WRITE YCR,"" ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END */ write "",YCR ;--------------------------------------- ; *6* - Created By / On ; VON VOM ;--------------------------------------- write "" write "" ; SR15387 ;IF $PIECE(TXT,Y,5)=1 WRITE "" write $piece(pobjMsg,Y,3)," /" write " " write $$^WWWDATE($piece(pobjMsg,Y,1)) write " " write $$^WWWTIME($piece(pobjMsg,Y,2)) write " " write "" write "",YCR write "",YCR quit ;=============================================================================== AddUser(pidUser,&parrUsers) PRIVATE ; internal subroutine ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Add current users to list ; ; History : ; 03-Apr-2007 GRF SR15387: created as common code ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dteTerminated,objUser quit:$data(parrUsers(pidUser)) set objUser = $get(^WWW013(0,pidUser,1)) set dteTerminated = $$$WWW013TerminationOn(objUser) if (dteTerminated="") || ($horolog" . . WRITE "" . . SET YI2="" . . FOR SET YI2=$ORDER(YII(YI2)) QUIT:YI2="" DO . . . IF YI2=0 SET YAA=$$^WWWTEXT(71) ;ALLE ANZEIGEN ;display . . . IF YI2'=0 SET YAA=$$^WWWTEXT(31005)_": "_$GET(YII(YI2)) ;PRIORITÄT ;priority . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE " " . . . IF YI2=$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",2) WRITE "" . . . WRITE YAA . . . WRITE " " . . . IF YI2=$PIECE(YFUNCT,"-",2) WRITE "" . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE "" . . ; . . WRITE "" . . WRITE "" . ; .
